word:
Chapter Six - Our Example in Welfare Ministry

     Christ Stands Before Us as the Great Pattern.-- Make Christ's work your example. Constantly He went about doing good--feeding the hungry and healing the sick. No one who came to Him for sympathy was disappointed. The commander of the heavenly courts, He was made flesh and dwelt among us, and His lifework is an example of the work we are to do. His tender, pitying love rebukes our selfishness and heartlessness.--Manuscripts 55, 1901.
